title: Bug 49536: Returning 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: Expecting the Tomcat 7 instance to return an HTTP error 404 instead of a HTTP code 200 OK with no content when no webapps are deployed.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance.
